thread.title: Chemical weapons agency - Inspectors took samples at second site in Douma

title: Chemical weapons agency - Inspectors took samples at second site in Douma

organizations.name: organisation for the prohibition of chemical weapons

text:
April 25, 2018 / 2:50 PM / Updated 40 minutes ago Chemical weapons agency - Inspectors took samples at second site in Douma Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
AMSTERDAM (Reuters) - Inspectors with the global chemical weapons agency on Wednesday visited a second site in Syriaâ€™s Douma and took samples to help them determine whether banned toxic munitions were used. Labels of the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW) are seen iside a damaged house in Douma in Damascus, Syria April 23, 2018. REUTERS/ Ali Hashisho
The Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons is investigating the death of dozens of people in the enclave outside of the Syrian capital on April 7. Reporting by Anthony Deutsch; Editing by Alison Williams
